attributes.action: Place all Freemason Membership on the Internet for Public Viewing
attributes.additional_details:
I think that a list of all members of the Freemason organisation should be placed on the internet for anyone to view.
It is my belief that Freemasons have obtained positions, contracts and favours in companies and civil services at the expense of better qualified people and companies.
Although suspicious, no one questions these decisions as there is no real proof of any Freemason association.
By being transparent, companies will be able to show that no favours have been given to Freemasons.
